author: cnbc.com
title: Clean Energy Fuels: 1Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
NEWPORT BEACH, Calif. (AP) _ Clean Energy Fuels Corp. (CLNE) on Thursday reported first-quarter net income of $12.2 million.
The Newport Beach, California-based company said it had profit of 8 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for stock option expense and non-recurring costs, came to 10 cents per share.
The provider of natural gas as an alternative fuel for vehicle fleets posted revenue of $102.4 million in the period.
In the final minutes of trading on Thursday, the company's shares hit $2.15. A year ago, they were trading at $2.60.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on CLNE at https://www.zacks.com/ap/CLNE
